Sidra Villas II offers the perfect surroundings for family life, bringing residents a wide array of amenities. The homes have been planned along the network of green corridors, providing shaded pathways, cycling and jogging tracks, exercise courses and community playgrounds.']

["DescriptionEXCLUSIVE FREEHOLD TOWNHOUSE IN LA MER
Luxury 3,4 and 5 Bedrooms Beach Townhouse 
G+2 Floor with Roof Garden 
La Mer is the first freehold area in Jumeirah 1 developed by Meraas. The destination incorporates a minimalist and contemporary design mix of dining, shopping, leisure, entertainment and hospitality experience.
Call today to get an exclusive unit and pricing - 0% Commission. 
● Premium 5 bedroom townhouse
● Waterfront living with 2.2 kilometers of relaxing beaches
● +190 Berth Marina and Yacht Club
● Direct access to the beach
● 5 star hospitality experience
● Seaside and marina promenades overlooking the Pearl Jumeirah
● Fashionable boutiques restaurants and cafe
● Outdoor parks with kid's play areas
● Excellent private facilities and amenities
● Connectivity to the popular locations in the City
● 5 minutes from City Walk
● 7 minutes from Downtown and Burj Khalifa
● 15 minutes Dubai International Airport
● Build Up Area: 6820 Square Feet
Property owners of Port De La Mer would also enjoy being a short walk away from Dubai’s most eclectic beachfront destination; La Mer and the ideal urban outdoor destination; City Walk. From water slides to water sports, movies to inflatable playgrounds, beach strolls to swims, gourmet dining to high-end shopping, these locations have everything a family and friends would want.
The spacious and comfortable floor plans will allow different interior designing ideas to be implemented and lift up the space with ample amount of sunlight and fresh air. It will be a perfect place to call home.
Sur La Mer townhouses will also be a great place to invest for investors looking to buy a property with a predicted ROI of 7% minimum and great capital appreciation due to it’s unique location and connectivity."]

descriptions: ['DescriptionLuxhabitat is proud to present this pool overlooking 1-bed apartment located in Belgravia 1 in Jumeirah Village Circle. It is a vacant unit. The apartment is located above the pool deck with a large balcony that is perfect for BBQ. It also features a 3.2-meter ceiling, with floor to ceiling glass windows, a well-equipped kitchen fitted with a microwave and state of the art bathrooms. The home also offers a large balcony. The apartment is chiller free and offers a temperature-controlled swimming pool, state of the art gym with Technogym equipment. Lobbies are complemented with work station and local art, along with free wifi in all common areas. The community area also boasts a plush lounge for residents that bring the outdoors, inside. In short, Belgravia is the new favourite for homeowners as well as for those owners who want to give out their properties for rent and value aesthetics and design along with contemporary community living.\nJumeirah Village is a residential and commercial community featuring a mixture of Arabic and Mediterranean villas and stylish townhouses. Covering two distinct areas the Triangle and the Circle, Jumeirah Village comprises a variety of residences, offices, commercial, retail and leisure facilities spread over 811 hectares. Jumeirah Village offers residents a real sense of community living. Coming soon to Jumeirah Village are two new developments: Al Khail Avenue at Jumeirah Village Triangle and The Circle Mall at Jumeirah Village Circle.']

descriptions: ['DescriptionThis brand new two-bedroom apartment in Burj Vista T1: - Two bedrooms with en-suite- Unfurnished - Brand New - Vacant The Dubai Mall is a shopper\x92s heaven, with every imaginable brand under one roof, as well as a host of other attractions including a giant aquarium and an Olympic-sized ice rink. It\x92s a huge draw not just for UAE residents but also for tourists from all over the GCC and the world who come not just to shop but to marvel at its sheer size and opulence. The neighbouring Souk Al Bahar is packed with restaurants and traditional artisanal stores, providing a contrast to the ultra modern style of the mall. Housing in Downtown district is roughly divided into two styles - contemporary skyscrapers and the more traditional Arabian style architecture of Old Town and Old Town Island. Many properties have fantastic views of the Burj Khalifa and the Dubai Fountains, meaning you never forget that you are living in one of the most exciting cities in the world.']
